Articles.Content:
Hello! I have downloaded the new DLC and whenever I try to launch from the Island Runway or Woomerang, they will not show up under the launch icon when I hover over it. This is a science save from 1.3.1 and I have the entire tech tree unlocked. I flew to Woomerang with a drone to make sure it was there, and it was. The Island Base is there also. Along with that, they both appear as launch sites in the tracking station. If I could get an answer that would be greatly appreciated! Thanks!

EDIT: This has been solved! Apparently I'm blind as a bat and didn't know it was in difficulty settings 

Edited March 18, 2018 by F3ARSTUNTS
